result.arabic_text: ۞ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَنۡ عَاقَبَ بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِهِۦ ثُمَّ بُغِيَ عَلَيۡهِ لَيَنصُرَنَّهُ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٞ
result.translation: 60. Woo caagidiy baxxaqqa koh hayneeh koi maaqne tonnaay dulmih caddok edde tatreeniih biyaaken num dulmik kaal baaheenih innah tanim keenil baahaamih idini kaah yontocowwimeeh wohul dambi kaa mayabbixa, tohuk lakal woo mari kaat qagteeh dulmih caddok kaat tatrek diggah yalli kaa cate leeh kaa qokle-le, diggah Yalli dambi leelah qafu abeey dambi cabtili kinni.
